org.opengis.cite.cat30.basic

Class OGCServiceTests

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opengis.cite.cat30.basic.OGCServiceTests

  • public class OGCServiceTests
extends Object

    Provides tests that apply to the OGC_Service interface defined in the common model as adapted for HTTP-based catalogue implementations. The following service requests are covered:

    • GetCapabilities: KVP syntax
    • GetRecordById: KVP syntax

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OGCServiceTests() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void getCapabilitiesForUnsupportedVersion()
      [Test] Verifies that a request for an unsupported version of a capabilities document produces an exception report containing the exception code "VersionNegotiationFailed".
      void getFullCapabilities()
      [Test] Verifies that the complete service capabilities document is schema-valid.
      void getRecordById_noMatchingRecord()
      [Test] Verifies that a request for a record by identifier produces a response with status code 404 (Not Found) if no matching resource is found.
      void initOGCServiceTests(ITestContext testContext)
      Initializes the test fixture with the following items: an HTTP client component. the CSW message schema (obtained from the suite attribute SuiteAttribute.CSW_SCHEMA, which should evaluate to a thread-safe Schema object). the service capabilities document (obtained from the suite attribute SuiteAttribute.TEST_SUBJECT, which should evaluate to a DOM Document node).
      void setServiceCapabilities(Document serviceDescription)
      Sets the service capabilities document.

      • OGCServiceTests

        public OGCServiceTests()

    • Method Detail

      • initOGCServiceTests

        public void initOGCServiceTests(ITestContext testContext)
        Initializes the test fixture with the following items:
        • an HTTP client component.
        • the CSW message schema (obtained from the suite attribute SuiteAttribute.CSW_SCHEMA, which should evaluate to a thread-safe Schema object).
        • the service capabilities document (obtained from the suite attribute SuiteAttribute.TEST_SUBJECT, which should evaluate to a DOM Document node).

        The request and response messages may be logged to a default JDK logger (in the namespace "com.sun.jersey.api.client").

        Parameters:
        testContext - The test context containing various suite attributes.

      • setServiceCapabilities

        public void setServiceCapabilities(Document serviceDescription)
        Sets the service capabilities document. This method is intended to facilitate unit testing.
        Parameters:
        serviceDescription - A Document node representing a service description (csw:Capabilities).

      • getFullCapabilities

        public void getFullCapabilities()
        [Test] Verifies that the complete service capabilities document is schema-valid. All catalogue services must support the GET method for a GetCapabilities request.

      • getCapabilitiesForUnsupportedVersion

        public void getCapabilitiesForUnsupportedVersion()
        [Test] Verifies that a request for an unsupported version of a capabilities document produces an exception report containing the exception code "VersionNegotiationFailed". The status code must be 400 (Bad Request) and the response entity must be an XML document having {http://www.opengis.net/ows/2.0}ExceptionReport as the document element.
        See Also:
        "OGC 06-121r9: 7.3.2, 8.6"

      • getRecordById_noMatchingRecord

        public void getRecordById_noMatchingRecord()
        [Test] Verifies that a request for a record by identifier produces a response with status code 404 (Not Found) if no matching resource is found. A response entity (an exception report) is optional; if present, the exception code shall be "InvalidParameterValue".
        See Also:
        "OGC 06-121r9: 9.3.3.2"
